title: The Ressurection
description: When you think about family tree, the first thing that comes to mind is history. There have been families that were in every World War. Others have been in the NFL winning countless championships. But no one has had a crazier and life threatening family history, than the Advincolas. Their ancestors have done all they could do to protect the Earth from the dark forces.And now, it's up to four brave teenagers to carry on the family tradition, and also their burden. Join these young men on a journey strength, peril, victory, and unexplainable endeavors.
author: Carlos Ram√≥n Advincola Jr.
